Does this cream have a fragrance? The Dermide Relief Barrier Moisturizer is free of artificial fragrances. Is it okay to use it with retinol? They’re okay to use as a part of the same routine. As everyone’s skin is unique, we recommend doing a patch test before committing to any new routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, affordable moisturizer for dry sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I just got this a few days ago, but I already know it is a great moisturizer. I will say the pump packaging is a bit cheap and feels like it could break.The moisturizer is unscented, no frills, and effective. It isn’t a super rich cream, but rich enough for day or night. For me, it is not quite heavy enough for PM for winter skin; I am using for AM. But in summer, it will be a good PM cream.It really does hydrate my dry skin (I have dry skin and use Tretinoin and other actives). It feels plump when I use it. No irritation at all. It is calming and soothing and an enjoyable experience to use. It doesn’t feel cheap. It maybe reminds me of the nice Cetaphil moisturizers like deep hydration line.It is a steal though with so much product at a reasonable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best moisturizer I’ve ever tried. Hands down🙌🏼
reviews.reviewText: To start off, I have very dry, sensitive, eczema, and acne prone skin. I also live in very dry climate, so that really dries me out more. I’ve tried many moisturizers and I’ve also tried a few Korean moisturizers. Most moisturizers either tend to break me out, are simply not hydrating enough, or burn/sting around my nose/mouth area. This moisturizer does none of that. I’ve been using it now off and on for 5 months. I tried using other Korean moisturizers during that time but many of those for some reason caused an allergic reaction. Mainly very bad itching and of course breakouts. I kept going back to this Purito moisturizer. When applying, it does go on a little streaky on me, but as I rub in, it absorbs nicely and gives a nice glow to my skin. It doesn’t smell like anything. I love that this moisturizer doesn’t have niacinamide or hyaluronic acid in it. Those do not agree with my skin at all and it’s hard to find products these days that don’t have those ingredients. This moisturizer does have 5 different ceramides in it as well. Which is amazing! Many moisturizers that advertise to be a ceramide moisturizer, sometimes only contain one ceramide. Overall, this is an amazing moisturizer. I hope Purito keeps this around forever and doesn’t change the ingredient list. It’s perfect the way it is! Thank you Purito!! I hope you like this moisturizer if you give it a try!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Innovative Pump Design
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased many Purito products before and was interested in new daily moisturizer so when I noticed this new line, I had to give it a shot. I love the airless pump design and the fact that one pump can cover my whole face. It has no fragrance and does not leave my skin greasy. The only reason why I removed a star is due to the fact that after one week of use no product would dispense. I had to look up online about airless pumps and found that you have to hit the bottom and depress the top upside down to get it to move properly. Once I did this, the product now dispenses as normal. I would definitely repurchase the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally! Saves my parched dehydrated skin!
reviews.reviewText: My skin type is combination, but my skin condition id dehydrated; thanks menopause. I have tried so many different products and came across this product, did my research and it does NOT disappoint. It has zero fragrance, is very creamy, does not feel heavy at all, and immediately quenches my skin and continues to do so all day long! I highly recommend this product! I will add, I have extremely sensitive skin and this has not bothered my skin one bit!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars amazing for dry skin!
reviews.reviewText: i love the texture, the price and the ability to absorb quickly. i have used a lot of pricey moisturizers and this one is the same if not better than most!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The pump broke
reviews.reviewText: A normal moisturizer, not greasy but nourishing, absorbs quickly and does not leave a sticky feeling. but the downside is that after a month the pump broke and you have to break the bottle to get the product out, so 3. the cream is good, but I can’t use it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Skin barrier miracle
reviews.reviewText: I have no idea what I did to my under eyes but for a month I was dealing with an absolute mess under them and everything burned, they were swollen and red, looked like I aged 10 years and couldn't wear any makeup lmao I was so mad. I started putting this on in the morning and night with aquaphor over it and 3 days later it cleared up and it's been good since. Looks like nothing ever happened.If my skin barrier feels irritated like that burning sensation, I'll use this and it's so calming and gentle. Love it.Absolutely no scent, it's pretty thick textured but is not heavy or greasy at all, I can use it under makeup and sunscreen. Little goes far. I purchased it as a last effort to try and not need to take time off of work to go see the dr and glad I did, its something I'd definitely like to buy again when it runs out

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great value for the amount you get. It works great on my skin and moisturizes it well. I would repurchase.

reviews.reviewTitle: What Moisturizer Dreams Are Made Of
reviews.reviewText: Wow! I am obsessed with this moisturizer🥹. My skin has been so dry, I really put it through some stuff with tretinoin and in two days it’s plumped up like I never thought possible. This is so hydrating and everything I need. It is rich and I wasn’t sure if I could wear it under make up but I just put a little less on and it gave the most beautiful makeup base. There is no scent at all which I really appreciate. 10000000 stars if I could
